verses.verse: Now <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7462>pasturing<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> his father-in-law, the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian;<s%> and he <S%H5090>led<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> to the <S%H310>west<s%> <S%H310>side<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him in a <S%H3852>blazing<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H5572>bush;<s%> and he <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5572>bush<s%> was <S%H1197>burning<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> yet the <S%H5572>bush<s%> was not <S%H398>consumed.<s%>

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I must <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>marvelous<s%> <S%H4758>sight,<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> the <S%H5572>bush<s%> is not <S%H1197>burned<s%> up."

When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7200>look,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to him from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5572>bush,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4872>"Moses,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses!<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> I am."

Then He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H1988>here;<s%> <S%H5394>remove<s%> your <S%H5275>sandals<s%> from your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> for the <S%H4725>place<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> you are <S%H5975>standing<s%> is <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>ground.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> also, "I am the <S%H430>God<s%> of your father, the <S%H1>God<s%> of <S%H430>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H85>God<s%> of <S%H430>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H3327>God<s%> of <S%H430>Jacob.<s%>" Then <S%H3290>Moses<s%> <S%H4872>hid<s%> his <S%H5641>face,<s%> for he was <S%H6440>afraid<s%> to <S%H3372>look<s%> at <S%H5027>God.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H7200>surely<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and have <S%H8085>given<s%> <S%H8085>heed<s%> to their <S%H6818>cry<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of their <S%H5065>taskmasters,<s%> for I am <S%H3045>aware<s%> of their <S%H4341>sufferings.<s%>

"So I have <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and to <S%H5927>bring<s%> them up from that <S%H776>land<s%> to a <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7342>spacious<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to Me; <S%H1571>furthermore,<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> are <S%H3905>oppressing<s%> them.

"Therefore, <S%H1980>come<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> so that you may <S%H3318>bring<s%> My <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> am I, that I should <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and that I should <S%H3318>bring<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?"

And He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Certainly<s%> I will be with you, and <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> to you that it is I who have <S%H7971>sent<s%> you: when you have <S%H3318>brought<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> you shall <S%H5647>worship<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H935>going<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and I shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'The <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers has <S%H1>sent<s%> me to you.' Now they may <S%H7971>say<s%> to me, <S%H559>'What<s%> is His <S%H4100>name<s%>?' <S%H8034>What<s%> shall I <S%H4100>say<s%> to them?"

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "I <S%H1961>AM<s%> <S%H834>WHO<s%> I <S%H1961>AM<s%>"; and He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'I <S%H1961>AM<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you.'"

And <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5750>furthermore,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers, the <S%H1>God<s%> of <S%H430>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H85>God<s%> of <S%H430>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H3327>God<s%> of <S%H430>Jacob,<s%> has <S%H3290>sent<s%> me to you.' <S%H7971>This<s%> is My <S%H2088>name<s%> <S%H8034>forever,<s%> and <S%H5769>this<s%> is My memorial-name to <S%H2088>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> together, and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'The <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers, the <S%H1>God<s%> of <S%H430>Abraham,<s%> <S%H85>Isaac<s%> and <S%H3327>Jacob,<s%> has <S%H3290>appeared<s%> to me, <S%H7200>saying,<s%> "I <S%H559>am<s%> <S%H6485>indeed<s%> <S%H6485>concerned<s%> about you and what has been <S%H6485>done<s%> to you in <S%H6213>Egypt.<s%>

"So I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> you up out of the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>"'

"And they will <S%H8085>pay<s%> <S%H8085>heed<s%> to <S%H6963>what<s%> you <S%H6963>say;<s%> and you with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and you will <S%H559>say<s%> to him, 'The <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> has <S%H7136>met<s%> with us. So <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H4994>please,<s%> let us <S%H1980>go<s%> a <S%H7969>three<s%> days' <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that we may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>'
"But I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will not <S%H5414>permit<s%> you to <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H3808>except<s%> under <S%H2389>compulsion.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

"So I will <S%H7971>stretch<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H6381>miracles<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I shall <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of it; and <S%H310>after<s%> that he will let you <S%H7971>go.<s%>

"And I will <S%H5414>grant<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and it shall be that when you <S%H1980>go,<s%> you will not <S%H1980>go<s%> empty-handed.

"But every <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> of her <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> and the woman who <S%H1481>lives<s%> in her <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8071>clothing;<s%> and you will <S%H7760>put<s%> them on your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> Thus you will <S%H5337>plunder<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>"
